ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED( Name ), ISCHANGED( PartnerPaymentBank__c ), ISCHANGED( PartnerPaymentBIC__c), ISCHANGED( PartnerPaymentBLZ__c), ISCHANGED( PartnerPaymentIBAN__c), ISCHANGED( Website ) ), OR( Id = "0011v00002DkQp6", Id = "0011v00002Dl29K", Id = "0011v00002DkX6F", Id = "0011v00002Dl28v", Id = "0011v00002Dl274", Id = "0011v00002Dl27x", Id = "0011v00002DkWvW", Id = "0011v00002DkWvC" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Bitte warten Sie, bis der entsprechende Partner Manager Sie best√§tigt hat.
